topic.title: Enhanced application deployment process
topic.description: Introduced separation between the application deployment, first time configuration and activation processes.

topic.title: Assigning users to running application instances
topic.description: Added possibility to manage the list of users with access to particular running application instance.

topic.title: Synchronisation of user SSH-keys with GitLab account
topic.description: Added new functionality to sync user GitLab accounts with keys provided on the user Profile page.

topic.title: Predefined contact form messages
topic.description: Added a set of message types to choose from when submitting the contact form.

topic.title: New application list sorting options
topic.description: Added the possibility to sort available applications by name, rating and popularity.

topic.title: User option to select between public/VPN access to service
topic.description: For any service defined by application manager as public, user during deployment can select either public or VPN-protected access.

topic.title: Fixed Portal actions and layout
topic.description: Fixed several front-end issues

topic.title: More user friendly interface
topic.description: The application market and instances views were altered in order to improve the ease of use.

topic.title: Minor improvements to enable WiFiMon application support
topic.description: Implemented support for passing auto-generated parameters during application deployment.

topic.title: Janitor support for Kubernetes 1.16
topic.description: Implemented necessary changes in Janitor component to allow for use of newer versions of Kubernetes clusters.

topic.title: Added support for public services
topic.description: Enabled particular services, if required by given application, to be reachable directly from public Internet (without any VPN).

topic.title: Platform API redesign and third-party library upgrades
topic.description: Implemented several changes in order to improve maintainability and security of the software.

topic.title: Added support for shell access to running applications
topic.description: A shell window was integrated into the Portal view allowing for SSH-like access to running application instances.

topic.title: Added support for advanced configuration using Git repository
topic.description: Enhanced both the NMaaS core components and Janitor to allow for creation of multiple ConfigMaps based on the content of Git repository of a given application instance.

topic.title: Added missing SSH key notification
topic.description: A modal window is displayed for domain administrators if they have not provided their SSH keys yet. Without the key, users will not be able to modify application configuration files through Git repository.

topic.title: Improved data exchange between the backend and user Portal
topic.description: A technical optimisation was applied in order to minimize the amount of data exchanged between the central database and user Portal.

topic.title: Minor improvements to enable ELK Stack support
topic.description: Implemented required changes like support for multiple internal access methods in order to enable ELK Stack tool deployment.

topic.title: User role-based access policy updated
topic.description: Domain user read/write permissions updated based on user feedback.

topic.title: Added support for global Helm deployment parameters
topic.description: The possibility to define static parameters to be passed during application installation allowed for integration of new tools.

topic.title: Janitor enhancements
topic.description: Improved the way Janitor is handling ConfigMap creation and added support for StatefulSets.

topic.title: Portal layout improvements
topic.description: Added GÃ‰ANT logo and EU funding clause in the footer.

topic.title: Advanced application deployment support
topic.description: Additional application deployment specification parameters were added in order to support more complex deployments.

topic.title: Advanced support for using Git repository for configuration updates
topic.description: Users are given SSH based access to Git repositories in order to apply changes in configuration files.

topic.title: Uploading user SSH keys
topic.description: Users are able to upload their SSH public keys on the Profile view.

topic.title: Domain administrator can add users to his domain
topic.description: Now the local domain admin can add users to his domain from the list of all users registered in the system.

topic.title: Enhanced user role assignment
topic.description: Several improvements in how user related actions can be performed by administrators.

topic.title: Single application can have multiple access methods
topic.description: Advanced support for application that may expose multiple UIs or other access methods like SSH.

topic.title: Support for multiple versions of a single application
topic.description: Added possibility to add and deploy multiple versions of an application.

topic.title: Janitor able to retrieve service IP address from K8s API
topic.description: NMaaS Janitor component is able to retrieve particular service IP address assigned by the MetalLB load balancer.

topic.title: Enhanced user management
topic.description: Added tracking of user first and latest login. Added email notification when user logs in with SSO for the first time.

topic.title: User interface improvements
topic.description: Several enhancements making the user interface more appealing.

topic.title: Adding support for new application
topic.description: Applied some changes in order to support new application.

topic.title: Adding support for new application
topic.description: Applied some changes in order to support new application.

topic.title: Displaying and filtering application instances
topic.description: Applied fix in how application instances are displayed and filtered by domain and given user.

topic.title: Updating application basic auth credentials
topic.description: The configuration update wizard form will allow to change basic auth credentials for given application instance.

topic.title: Admin area user interface enhancements
topic.description: Set of UI improvements mainly on the administrator views.

topic.title: Human readable Helm release names
topic.description: Application instances deployed with release names allowing for easy identification.

topic.title: Ability to mark NMaaS installation as a test instance
topic.description: When user logs in on a test NMaaS instance a popup window is deployed with appropriate information.

topic.title: Application management added
topic.description: New functionality and dedicated view in the UI allows for adding and maintaining information about NMaaS applications.

topic.title: Language management added
topic.description: New functionality and dedicated view in the UI allows for maintaining translations of labels and texts displayed in the UI and the content of emails in all supported languages.

topic.title: About page added
topic.description: Added dedicated About page with information about current and previous versions of NMaaS and a contact form.

topic.title: Extended nmaas-janitor to use readiness probes
topic.description: A deployed application instance transits to running state when application is actually ready.

topic.title: Setting basic authentication details for application instances
topic.description: Configuration wizards for applications that do not come with build in user management were extended to allow for setting custom user and password on per application instance basis.

topic.title: Layout and translation improvements
topic.description: Several modifications were introduced in order to improve user experience including reworked application comments view and support for application description texts displayed in different languages.

topic.title: New nmaas-janitor component added
topic.description: New component added in order to improve the application instance configuration process to use ConfigMaps.

topic.title: Added support for configuration updates
topic.description: It is now possible to update configuration of already running application instances.

topic.title: New library used for configuration wizard forms generation
topic.description: New library offers many interesting features and is actively developed.

topic.title: Implemented new version of the NMaaS notification service
topic.description: The nmaas-notification component is no longer used. Email templates have been improved.

topic.title: Implemented new application view
topic.description: New version of application view and rating system added to NMaaS.

topic.title: During deployment of Prometheus application, user cannot remove added targets
topic.description: There were some problems with old configuration wizard form generation library. Solved with new library to control that.

topic.title: Removed support for Docker Compose deployment
topic.description: In the current version only container deployment in Kubernetes is supported. Application source code has been cleaned and optimized.

topic.title: Support for Docker Compose and Kubernetes deployment environments
topic.description: NMaaS supports deployment of applications in two container orchestration environments.

topic.title: Support for 6 network management applications
topic.description: Six network management applications were integrated and added to NMaaS portfolio.

topic.title: Support for configuration files storage on GitLab repository
topic.description: Application instance configuration files are stored in dedicated repositories on GitLab.
